H1.text: who is the senior senator of louisiana. John Breaux

H2.text: who is the senior senator of louisiana. Buddy Roemer

H3.text: who is the senior senator of louisiana. Mary Landrieu

A4.text: In 2004, Landrieu became Louisiana's senior senator upon the retirement of John Breaux.

A5.text: John Breaux retired in 2004, making him no longer the senior senator.
